detail_desc: Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Shorts in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise at the hem, a zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Flared skirt in glittery tulle. Shimmering elastic waistband with a sewn-on bow. Lined.
Oversized, straight-cut shirt in cotton canvas with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long, cable-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a wide rib-knit polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, jetted front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No fasteners. Unlined.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Adjustable elastic braces, zip fly and press-stud, wind flap with a hook and loop fastening, elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective strip on one leg. Lined.
Short coat in sturdy, felted fabric with a visible zip down the front and flap front pockets. Lined.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, glittery sections, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trousers in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, heart-shaped front pockets, back pockets and flared hems.
Headwear designed for a dog with an adjustable elastic strap under the chin.
Low ankle boots in suede with an unlined shaft, pointed toes and a concealed zip with a metal pendant. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, and elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with long puff sleeves and ribbed, lace-trimmed frilled cuffs.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in printed viscose jersey with frill trims around the armholes and an elasticated seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of dungarees in organic cotton. Jersey bodysuit with a button placket, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Pattern-weave dungarees with pockets, straps that cross at the back with decorative buttons and fasten with buttons at the front, and elastication at the waist and hems. Lined.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Detachable tie belt at the waist, long, slightly wider sleeves, and narrow cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt in a soft cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidery detail on the chest, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly and skinny legs. The jeans are made of COOLMAX® material that is designed to keep you cool in hot weather.
Straight-cut jacket in faux fur with a large collar, dropped shoulders, patch front pockets and concealed press-studs down the front. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and linen weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit cotton jumper with long sleeves and an open chest pocket.
5-pocket trousers in soft twill with elasticated ribbing at the waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Short, boxy jacket in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, high collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Imitation leather sandals with cork midsoles, straps with hook and loop fastenings and a loop at the back. Imitation suede linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
A pair of earrings in metal with leaf-shaped pendants in metal and lemon-shaped pendants in plastic. Length 6 cm.
Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a dress, pair of leggings and hairband in soft fabric. Long-sleeved dress in velour with smocking at the waist and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings and hairband in jersey with a shimmering metallic pattern. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Hairband with a bow at the front.
Coat in a textured weave with notch lapels, a loose yoke and single back vent. Concealed pockets in the side seams, detachable tie belt at the waist and no buttons. Unlined.
V-neck top in sequined mesh with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Top in thin sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck and short puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim.

Lace bra with underwired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Wide adjustable shoulder straps and a slightly wider fastener at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Straight-cut V-neck top in a linen weave with narrow shoulder straps.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap, zip at the top and imitation suede details. Lined. Depth 4 cm. Height 15 cm. Width 23.5 cm.

LIMITED EDITION. Long dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, pleated top, cap sleeves with a decorative drawstring on the shoulders, and a concealed zip at the back. Inset panel at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt with a frill-trimmed seam and flared flounce to the hem. Lined.
Short lace dress with a V-neck front and back, short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the top.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a contrasting colour elasticated waistband and 3/4-length legs.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a racer back.
Modern, straight-cut kaftan in heavily draping, glossy jersey. Softly draped neckline, gathers at the shoulders and long, close-fitting sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Double-layered hat in soft cotton jersey.
Short, flared dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the top, and a gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted thong body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Square neckline, long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, off-the-shoulder flounced dress woven in a textured Tencel™ lyocell blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and short sleeves with elastication at the top. Lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit, fluffy yarn with patch front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck and wide, flared sleeves. Asymmetric seam with a flounce at the waist, covered elastication at the back of the waist and a flared peplum. Lined.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood with a wrapover front that has decorative eyelets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted, dress in satin with a small V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and lined cups.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs, two with a pendant.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood, yoke at the back and long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Hooded jacket with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with thermal fleece inside. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets, ribbed panels at the sides and long raglan sleeves.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.
Oversized, double-breasted twill jacket in a wool blend with notch lapels, flap front pockets and buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Polo shirt in premium cotton slub jersey with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Treggings in stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Dungaree dress in soft organic cotton corduroy with buttons at the sides and straps with buttons. Jersey lining at the front.

Set with a T-shirt and joggers in soft cotton. T-shirt in soft, printed jersey. Joggers in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up with a rubber appliqué at the front.
